metadata.title: CVE-2014-3209 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
The ldns-keygen tool in ldns 1.6.x uses the current umask to set theprivileges of the private key, which might allow local users to obtain theprivate key by reading the file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-3209` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ldnsutils - 1.6.17-8
libldns1 - 1.6.17-8
python-ldns - 1.6.17-8
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ldns package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.6.17-8').
